sqlMap.select: select count(1) from t_net_order t where T.bill_state <>0 t.id='$pid$' t.name='$pname$' t.unit='$punit$' t.province='$pprovince$' t.city='$pcity$' t.county='$pcounty$' t.address='$paddress$' t.areacode='$pareacode$' t.tel='$ptel$' t.mobile='$pmobile$' t.recprovince='$precprovince$' t.reccity='$preccity$' t.post='$ppost$' t.mailtype='$pmailtype$' t.clientremark='$pclientremark$' t.orderingnum='$porderingnum$' t.orderingweight='$porderingweight$' t.bookingtime=cast(#pbookingtime# AS DATETIME) t.orderingtime=cast(#porderingtime# AS DATETIME) t.recevingtime=cast(#precevingtime# AS DATETIME) t.orderingstate=cast(#porderingstate# AS DATETIME) t.bill_state='$pbill_state$' t.create_code='$pcreate_code$' t.create_date=cast(#pcreate_date# AS DATETIME) t.editor_code='$peditor_code$' t.editor_date=cast(#peditor_date# AS DATETIME)

select t.id,t.name,t.unit,t.province, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.province) provincename, t.city,GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.city) cityname, t.county,GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.county) countyname,t.address,t.areacode, t.tel,t.mobile, t.recprovince,GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.recprovince) recprovincename, t.reccity,GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.reccity) reccityname, t.post,t.mailtype,case when t.mailtype=0 then '物品型' else '文件型' end mailtypename, t.clientremark,t.orderingnum,t.orderingweight, to_char(t.bookingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') bookingtime, to_char(t.orderingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') orderingtime, to_char(T.recevingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') recevingtime, t.orderingstate,t.bill_state,t.addressid, t.create_code,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.create_code) create_name,to_char(T.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATE, t.editor_code,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.EDITOR_CODE) EDITOR_NAME,to_char(T.editor_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') editor_date from t_net_order t where T.bill_state <>0 t.id='$pid$' t.name='$pname$' t.unit='$punit$' t.province='$pprovince$' t.city='$pcity$' t.county='$pcounty$' t.address='$paddress$' t.areacode='$pareacode$' t.tel='$ptel$' t.mobile='$pmobile$' t.recprovince='$precprovince$' t.reccity='$preccity$' t.post='$ppost$' t.mailtype='$pmailtype$' t.clientremark='$pclientremark$' t.orderingnum='$porderingnum$' t.orderingweight='$porderingweight$' t.bookingtime=cast(#pbookingtime# AS DATETIME) t.orderingtime=cast(#porderingtime# AS DATETIME) t.recevingtime=cast(#precevingtime# AS DATETIME) t.orderingstate=cast(#porderingstate# AS DATETIME) t.bill_state='$pbill_state$' t.create_code='$pcreate_code$' t.create_date=cast(#pcreate_date# AS DATETIME) t.editor_code='$peditor_code$' t.editor_date=cast(#peditor_date# AS DATETIME) order by T.ID desc

select * from (select row_limit.*,rownum rownum_ from( select t.id,t.name,t.unit,t.province, GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.province) provincename, t.city,GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.city) cityname, t.county,GetParValue('COUNTYID_NAME',t.county) countyname,t.address,t.areacode, t.tel,t.mobile, t.recprovince,GetParValue('PROVINCEID_NAME',t.recprovince) recprovincename, t.reccity,GetParValue('CITYID_NAME',t.reccity) reccityname, t.post,t.mailtype,case when t.mailtype=0 then '物品型' else '文件型' end mailtypename, t.clientremark,t.orderingnum,t.orderingweight, to_char(t.bookingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') bookingtime, to_char(t.orderingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') orderingtime, to_char(T.recevingtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') recevingtime, t.orderingstate,t.bill_state,t.addressid, t.create_code,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.create_code) create_name,to_char(T.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATE, t.editor_code,GetParValue('USERID_USERNAME',T.EDITOR_CODE) EDITOR_NAME,to_char(T.editor_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') editor_date from t_net_order t where T.bill_state <>0 t.id='$pid$' t.name='$pname$' t.unit='$punit$' t.province='$pprovince$' t.city='$pcity$' t.county='$pcounty$' t.address='$paddress$' t.areacode='$pareacode$' t.tel='$ptel$' t.mobile='$pmobile$' t.recprovince='$precprovince$' t.reccity='$preccity$' t.post='$ppost$' t.mailtype='$pmailtype$' t.clientremark='$pclientremark$' t.orderingnum='$porderingnum$' t.orderingweight='$porderingweight$' t.bookingtime=cast(#pbookingtime# AS DATETIME) t.orderingtime=cast(#porderingtime# AS DATETIME) t.recevingtime=cast(#precevingtime# AS DATETIME) t.orderingstate=cast(#porderingstate# AS DATETIME) t.bill_state='$pbill_state$' t.create_code='$pcreate_code$' t.create_date=cast(#pcreate_date# AS DATETIME) t.editor_code='$peditor_code$' t.editor_date=cast(#peditor_date# AS DATETIME) order by T.ID desc )row_limit where rownum <=$END$ ) where rownum_>= $START$
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_net_order (id name unit province city county address areacode tel mobile recprovince reccity post mailtype clientremark orderingnum orderingweight bookingtime orderingstate create_code editor_code orderingtime recevingtime addressid ,bill_state,create_date,editor_date) values (seqformat('t_net_order') #pname# #punit# #pprovince# #pcity# #pcounty# #paddress# #pareacode# #ptel# #pmobile# #precprovince# #preccity# #ppost# #pmailtype# #pclientremark# #porderingnum# #porderingweight# TO_DATE('$pbookingtime$','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #porderingstate# #pcreate_code# #peditor_code# sysdate sysdate #paddressid# ,1,sysdate,sysdate)
sqlMap.delete: update t_net_order set bill_state=0 where id=#pid#
sqlMap.update: update t_net_order t set t.id=t.id name=#pname# unit=#punit# province=#pprovince# city=#pcity# county=#pcounty# address=#paddress# areacode=#pareacode# tel=#ptel# mobile=#pmobile# recprovince=#precprovince# reccity=#preccity# post=#ppost# mailtype=#pmailtype# clientremark=#pclientremark# orderingnum=#porderingnum# orderingweight=#porderingweight# bookingtime=TO_DATE('$pbookingtime$','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') orderingtime=sysdate recevingtime=sysdate orderingstate=#porderingstate# create_code=#pcreate_code# editor_code=#peditor_code# editor_date=sysdate addressid=#paddressid# where id=#pid# and t.bill_state <>0
